data.name: AboutPersonalCompareText
data.value: See how ONLYOFFICE™ compares to Google Drive and Office365 word processors:

data.name: AboutPersonalEnableText
AboutPersonalMoreInfoText
data.value: For more information, please proceed to the official website {0}www.onlyoffice.com{1}

data.name: AboutPersonalQuestionText
data.value: Feel free to contact us at {0}personal@onlyoffice.com{2} or join {1}our Facebook community{2}!

data.name: AboutPersonalTheBestHeader
data.value: What makes ONLYOFFICE™ processors the best?

data.name: AboutPersonalTheBestText1
data.value: {0}If you are a user:{1} they combine the formatting quality of MS Office & online collaboration of Google Docs.

data.name: AboutPersonalTheBestText2
data.value: {0}If you are a tech enthusiast:{1} they're built with the use of HTML5 element, Canvas.

data.name: AboutPersonalUseHeader
data.value: Would like to use ONLYOFFICE™ in your company?

data.name: AboutPersonalUseText
data.value: ONLYOFFICE™ Personal rises from ONLYOFFICE™ - collaborative suite for small and medium business. Apart from document processors, ONLYOFFICE™ includes project and document management toolset, CRM system and Email aggregator.

data.name: AboutPersonalWhatIsItText
data.value: ONLYOFFICE™ Personal is a suite of online processors for text documents, spreadsheets and presentations with co-editing and commenting capabilities. It is free for individual use.

data.name: AccessRightsAccessToProduct
data.value: Access to {0} module is given to

data.name: AccessRightsChangeOwnerConfirmText
data.value: Changes will be applied after the confirmation via email.

data.name: AccessRightsChangeOwnerText

data.value: {0} module is disabled and is not shown on the portal. To enable it, refer to the Modules & Tools section of the Portal Settings

data.value: Your account is almost active now

data.name: AccountDeactivationConfirmMsg

data.value: Email address that can be used to contact you

data.name: AdminMessageTitle
data.value: If you are an existing {!user} and have problems accessing this portal or you want to register as the portal new {!user}, please contact the portal administrator using the form below.

data.name: AllRightsReservedText
data.value: © Ascensio System SIA {0}. All rights reserved.

data.name: AuthDocsCheckEmail
data.value: Check your email inbox to confirm the account.

data.name: AuthDocsEditText
data.value: Edit word docs, spreadsheets and presentations online

data.name: AuthDocsEnterViaSocial
data.value: Or enter via your social networks

data.name: AuthDocsMetaDescription
data.value: ONLYOFFICE Personal is a free online office perfectly compatible with Microsoft(R) formats. It is an alternative to MS Office and enables you to edit word documents, spreadsheets and presentations online for free.

data.name: AuthDocsMetaKeywords
data.value: edit word online, word editor online, word online free, word office online

data.name: AuthDocsSendActivationEmail
data.value: Your activation email has been sent to

data.name: AuthDocsThanksRegistration
data.value: Thank you for registering your Personal ONLYOFFICE™.

data.name: AuthDocsTitlePage
data.value: Get Free Office In The Cloud

data.name: AuthorizationKeysText
data.value: Authorization keys is the option which allows you to connect your ONLYOFFICE™ portal with the third party services like DropBox, Facebook, Twitter etc. Connect your portal with Facebook, Linkedin or Twitter if you don't want to introduce your portal credentials every time you enter it. Link it up with such services like DropBox, OneDrive, etc. to transfer the documents from all those storages to ONLYOFFICE™ Documents module. Connect ONLYOFFICE™ portal with Facebook (update information about people) to refresh the information about your CRM contacts.

data.name: AutoBackupText
data.value: Use this option for automatic backup of the portal data.

data.name: AutoDataBackupHelp
data.value: The {0}Automatic backup{1} option is used to automate the portal data backup process to be able to restore it later on a local server or SaaS portal. Choose the data storage, automatic backup period and maximal number of saved copies.{2}{0}Note:{1} before you can save the backup data to a third party account (DropBox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive), you will need to connect this account to ONLYOFFICE Common Documents folder.

data.name: BackupCopyCount
data.value: The maximal number of backup copies to be stored

data.name: BackupNotAvailableThirdServices
data.value: No third-party services are connected.{0}Go to the "Documents" module to connect.

data.name: BackupReadyText
data.value: You can download the backup to your local drive using the link below. The link will be active for 24 hours after the time it was requested.

data.name: BackupText
data.value: Use this option if you want to get all data contained on the portal as a file.

data.name: BackupThirdStorageDisable
data.value: You need to connect your third party account (DropBox, Box.com, OneDrive or Google Drive) to ONLYOFFICE Common Documents folder before you will be able to save your backup there.

data.value: All the data you entered will be lost. Are you sure you want to continue?

data.value: A link to confirm the operation has been sent to :email (the email address of the portal owner).

data.name: ConsumersBitlyDescription
data.value: Подключить сервис Bitly для сокращения пригласительных ссылок на портал и расшаренных ссылок в Документах.

data.name: ConsumersBitlyInstruction
data.value: Добавив сервис Bitly Вы будуте получать сокращенные ссылки для приглашения новых пользователей на портал ONLYOFFICE™ и сокращённые ссылки для расшаренных на внешний доступ документов в модуле Документы.

data.name: ConsumersBoxDescription
data.value: Подключить приложение для управления файлами и папками Box.

data.name: ConsumersBoxInstruction
data.value: Добавив приложение сервиса Box Вы сможете подключать свои аккаунт в модуле Документы. Это позволит загружать и создавать новые файлы в Box, редактировать существующие, копировать и удалять, предоставлять доступ к файлам и папкам для пользователей портала ONLYOFFICE™.

data.name: ConsumersDocuSignDescription
data.value: Подключить приложение для добавления электронной подписи DocuSign к документам.

data.name: ConsumersDocuSignInstruction
data.value: Добавив приложение сервиса DocuSign Вы сможете подписывать файлы модуля Документы. Это позволит вам отправлять файл на получение электронной подписи сотрудникам портала ONLYOFFICE™ средствами сервиса DocuSugn. Подписанный файл будет сохранён в Документах порала ONLYOFFICE™.

data.name: ConsumersDropBoxDescription
data.value: Подключить приложение для управления файлами и папками Dropbox.

data.name: ConsumersDropBoxInstruction
data.value: Добавив приложение сервиса Dropbox Вы сможете подключать свои аккаунт в модуле Документы. Это позволит загружать и создавать новые файлы в Dropbox, редактировать существующие, копировать и удалять, предоставлять доступ к файлам и папкам для пользователей портала ONLYOFFICE™.

data.name: ConsumersFacebookDescription
data.value: Подключить приложение для входа на портал по учетной записи Facebook и поиска контактов.

data.name: ConsumersFacebookInstruction
data.value: Добавив приложение сервиса Facebook Вы сможете на странице своего профиля подключить вход на портал ONLYOFFICE™ используя аккаунт Facebook. Так же Вы сможете на странице редактирования персоны CRM находить и привязывать аккаунт Facebook.

data.name: ConsumersGoogleDescription
data.value: Подключить проект для входа на портал по учетной записи Google и для управления файлами и папками Google Drive.

data.name: ConsumersGoogleInstruction
data.value: Добавив проект сервиса Google Вы сможете на странице своего профиля подключить вход на портал ONLYOFFICE™ используя аккаунт Google и подключать свои аккаунт в модуле Документы. Это позволит загружать и создавать новые файлы в Google Drive, редактировать существующие, копировать и удалять, предоставлять доступ к файлам и папкам для пользователей портала ONLYOFFICE™.

data.name: ConsumersLinkedInDescription
data.value: Подключить приложение для входа на портал по учетной записи LinkedIn.

data.name: ConsumersLinkedInInstruction
data.value: Добавив приложение сервиса LinkeIn Вы сможете на странице своего профиля подключить вход на портал ONLYOFFICE™ используя аккаунт LinkedIn.

data.name: ConsumersSkyDriveDescription
data.value: Подключить приложение для управления файлами и папками OneDrive.

data.name: ConsumersSkyDriveInstruction
data.value: Добавив приложение сервиса OneDrive Вы сможете подключать свои аккаунт в модуле Документы. Это позволит загружать и создавать новые файлы в OneDrive, редактировать существующие, копировать и удалять, предоставлять доступ к файлам и папкам для пользователей портала ONLYOFFICE™.

data.name: ConsumersTwitterDescription
data.value: Подключить приложение для входа на портал по учетной записи Twitter и поиска контактов.

data.name: ConsumersTwitterInstruction
data.value: Добавив приложение сервиса Twitter Вы сможете на странице своего профиля подключить вход на портал ONLYOFFICE™ используя аккаунт Twitter. Так же Вы сможете на странице персоны CRM привязывать аккаунт и читать новости Twitter.

data.name: ConsumersTwilioDescription
data.value: Подключить Twilio для получения возможности совершения вызовов контактов CRM прямо из браузера.

data.name: ConsumersTwilioInstruction
data.value: Добавив Twilio Вы сможете звонить любому контакту из CRM прямо из браузера.

data.value: You can upload an image not larger than 200x300 pixels, otherwise resizing will take place. The maximum image size cannot exceed 1 MB.

data.name: DocServiceText
data.value: Document service location specifies the address of the server with the document services installed. Please change the '<editors-dns-name>' for the server address in the below lines leaving the rest of the line exactly as it is.

data.name: DocServiceUrlHelp
data.value: {1}Document Service{2} is the server service which allows to perform the document viewing and editing.{0}{1}Command Service{2} is the server service used to notify about the events when the document editing is being done.{0}{1}Storage Service{2} is the server service which is used to get the external link to the opened document.{0}{1}Conversion Service{2} is the server service which allows to convert the document file into the appropriate OfficeOpen XML format.

data.name: EmailActivationPanelBodyText

data.name: ForSignInFollowMessage
data.value: To sign in please follow this {0}link{1}

data.name: FullTextSearchServiceIsNotRunning
data.value: Full text search service is not running

data.name: FullTextSearchServiceIsRunning
data.value: Full text search service is running

data.name: FullTextSearchSettingsHelp
data.value: To use the full text search you need sphinx.2.2.10 installed on your server.

data.name: FullTextSearchSettingsText
data.value: Settings for work with sphinx, indexer and search daemon launch. You need to specify the host and the port number which is listened to by the searchd search daemon. These settings must coincide with sphinx configuration in the searchd section of the sphinx.conf.in file.

data.name: HelpAnswerAccountDeactivation
data.value: If you wish to {1}deactivate{2} the portal, your portal and all information associated with it will be blocked so that no one has access to it for a particular period. To do that click the {1}Deactivate{2} button. A link to confirm the operation will be sent to the email address of the portal owner.{0}In case you want to come back to the ONLYOFFICE™ portal and resume using it you will need to use the second link provided in the confirmation email. So, please, keep this email in a safe place.{0}If you do not think you will use the ONLYOFFICE™ portal and would like to {1}delete{2} your portal permanently submit your request using the {1}Delete{2} button. Please, keep in mind that you will not be able to reactivate your portal or recover any information associated with it.

data.name: HelpAnswerAdminMessSettings
data.value: {1}Administrator Message Settings{2} is a way to contact the portal administrator.{0}Enable this option to display the contact form on the {1}Sign In{2} page so that people could send the message to the portal administrator in case they have troubles accessing the portal.{0}To make the parameters you set take effect click the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerColorTheme
data.value: {1}Color Themes{2} let you customize your portal interface according to your company brand.{0} Select one of the color themes from the list on the left.{0} To apply the selected color theme, click the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of this section.

data.name: HelpAnswerDefaultPageSettings
data.value: {0}Default Start Page{1} is a way to select the module you go to right after you log in to the portal or click the ONLYOFFICE™ logo when you have already signed in. To make the parameters you set take effect click the {0}Save{1} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerDNSSettings
data.value: {1}DNS Settings{2} is a way to set an alternative URL for your ONLYOFFICE™ portal.{0}Check the {1}Custom domain name{2} box and specify your own domain name for the ONLYOFFICE™ portal in the field below.{0} To make the parameters you set take effect click the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerGreetingSettings
data.value: {1}Welcome Page Settings{2} is a way to change the default portal title to be displayed on the {1}Welcome Page{2} of your portal. The same name is also used for the {1}From{2} field of your portal email notifications.{0}Enter the name you like in the {1}Title{2} field.

data.name: HelpAnswerLinkInviteSettings
data.value: Share the link to invite your colleagues to your portal.

data.name: HelpAnswerLngTimeSettings
data.value: {1}Language and Time Zone Settings{2} is a way to change the language of the whole portal for all portal users and to configure the time zone so that all the events of the ONLYOFFICE™ portal will be shown with the correct date and time.{0}To make the parameters you set take effect click the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerLogoSettings
data.value: {1}Logo Settings{2} is a way to change the default logo to be displayed on the {1}Welcome Page{2} of your portal.{0} To replace the portal logo click the {1}Change Logo{2} link to the right and select the image stored on your computer to load it to your portal.{0}Please, keep in mind that you can upload an image not larger than {1}250x100 pixels{2}, otherwise resizing will take place. The maximum image size cannot exceed {1}1 MB{2}.

data.name: HelpAnswerMailDomainSettings
data.value: {1}Trusted Mail Domain Settings{2} is a way to specify the mail servers used for user self-registration.{0}You can either to check the {1}Custom domains{2} option and enter the trusted mail server in the field below so that person who has an account at it will be able to register him(her)self by clicking the Join link on the {1}Sign In{2} page or disable this option.{0}To make the parameters you set take effect click the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerPasswordSettings
data.value: {1}Password Strength Settings{2}is a way to determine the effectiveness of a password in resisting guessing and brute-force attacks.{0}Use the {1}Minimum Password Length{2} bar to determine how long the password should be. Check the appropriate boxes below to determine the character set that must be used in the password.{0}To make the parameters you set take effect click the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerPortalAccessSettings
data.value: {1}Public Portal{2} is a free option that allows anyone to view your public contents without registration. No private projects are available and the CRM module is disabled for such portals.{0}Registration to public portals is not limited in number of users, new users are added upon the request to the portal administrator. Use the {1}Register new users Immediately{2} option to remove any registration confirmation necessity.

data.name: HelpAnswerPortalRename
data.value: Here you can change your portal address. Enter the part that will appear next to the onlyoffice.com/onlyoffice.eu portal address. *Please note*: your old portal address will become available to new ONLYOFFICE users once you click the 'Save' button.

data.name: HelpAnswerPortalVersion
data.value: {1}Portal Version{2} is a way to switch between the available ONLYOFFICE™ portal versions.{0}You can either use the new version or switch back to the previous version of the portal.{0}To make the parameters you set take effect click the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerTeamTemplate
data.value: {1}Team Template{2} is a customizable way to name the organization (or group), its members and their activities.{0}Drop down the {1}Template{2} list to choose one of the available presets or enter the names yourselves selecting the {1}Custom{2} option from the list.{0}To apply the selected template use the {1}Save{2} button at the bottom of the section.

data.name: HelpAnswerTransferPortal
data.value: Migrating the portal to the servers of the region closest to your geographical location will make the portal response faster. The closer your users and clients are located to the server region, the faster the portal speed will be.{0}To start the migration process click the {1}Change Server Region{2} button at the section bottom.{0}{1}Note:{2} once the process is started, it cannot be canceled. Please also note that due to technical limitations only the mail for the last 30 days will be transferred.

data.name: HelpJoinToAffilliate
data.value: The program purpose is to legally advertise ONLYOFFICE™ to receive a commission on subscriptions purchased by referred individuals.

data.name: HintForSocialAccounts
data.value: Enter your account login name or ID

data.name: HowToImportBox
data.value: How to import the documents from Box?

data.name: HowToImportCSV
data.value: How to import contacts from a CSV file?

data.name: HowToImportGoogle
data.value: How to import the documents from Google Drive?

data.name: HowToImportMailClient
data.value: How to transfer contacts from a mail client address book to ONLYOFFICE™?

data.name: HowToImportWorld
data.value: How to import contacts from Yahoo, Google, Windows Live to ONLYOFFICE™?

data.name: HowToImportZoho
data.value: How to import the documents from Zoho?

data.name: ImportContactsDescription
data.value: Add {!users} using the contact information from Google, Yahoo from a CSV file{0} or an email client contact book, or entering the {!user} first and last name and email manually.

data.name: ImportContactsEmptyData
data.value: No contacts have been received.{0}You can also import contacts from other profiles.

data.name: ImportContactsFirstable
data.value: Please, enter the first name, last name and email of a {!user} who will be added to the portal into the fields above. Click the 'Add' button to append the {!user} to the list.

data.name: ImportContactsFromFileError
data.value: The file selected for importing has a wrong format.{0}Please, select another file and repeat the importing process once again.

data.name: ImportContactsIncorrectFields
data.value: Make sure that all user fields including first name, last name and email address are filled correctly

data.name: ImportContactsInviteHint
data.value: Use this link to invite co-workers and friends to join your portal. Copy the link below and paste into the email to send it to the people you wish to invite. After they follow this link and enter their email, first name, last name and password they will be automatically added to your portal and will be able to start collaborating with you. The link is valid for 7 days.

data.name: ImportContactsSmallDescription
data.value: You need a properly formed CSV file to import {!users} from it. The file must have the following row structure: Email,First name,Last name

data.name: ImportUserLimitDecision
data.value: Do you agree to add users with the specified rights?

data.name: ImportUserLimitHeader
data.value: You current pricing plan allows you to add {0} users.

data.name: ImportUserLimitReason
data.value: Upgrade your pricing plan or add more users as guests with view-only permissions. You will be able to change their roles later in the 'People' module.

data.name: ImportUserOpenPortalLimitReason
data.value: Upgrade your plan or add more users as guests with view-only permissions. You will be able to change their roles later in the 'People' module or {0}Read about non-profit usage{1}

data.name: ImportUserOverlimitHeader
data.value: Your pricing plan does not allow you to add any more users

data.name: ImportUserOverlimitReason
data.value: The selected users will be added as guests. You will be able to change their roles later in the 'People' module.

data.name: InviteDescription
data.value: In order to begin work on the portal, you should see if your {0}first name{1} and {0}last name{1} are correct in the right-side form, and set a {0}personal password{1} to be able to login.

data.name: InvitePublicSubTitle
data.value: You received the link to this portal from a friend, acquaintance or colleague of yours

data.value: You were added to this portal by a friend, acquaintance or colleague of yours

data.name: InviteTitle
data.value: You are invited to join this portal!

data.name: IpSecurityHelp
data.value: {0}IP Security{1} is used to restrict login to the portal from all IP addresses except certain addresses. You can set the allowed IP addresses using either exact IP addresses in the IPv4 format (#.#.#.#, where # is a numeric value from 0 to 255) or IP range (in the #.#.#.#-#.#.#.# format). The IP security does not work for portal owners, they can access the portal from any IP address.

data.name: IpSecurityWarning
data.value: First you need to specify your current IP or the IP range your current IP address belongs to, otherwise your portal access will be blocked right after you save the settings. The portal owner will have the portal access from any IP address.

data.name: IsMailMigration
data.value: Migrate ONLYOFFICE™ Mail as well (not recommended)

data.name: KeepTariffInviteGuests
data.value: You can keep adding the users as {!guests} or change the pricing plan for the one with a larger number of users.

data.name: LdapSettingsAuthenticationHelper
data.value: Enable this option if the current Windows user does not have rights to read from LDAP server/Active Directory, and enter the credentials of another user with the read rights.

data.name: LdapSettingsEnableLdapAuthenticationHelper
data.value: Enable this option if you want to add users from LDAP server/Active Directory to ONLYOFFICE™ automatically. The added users will be able to authorize using their LDAP server/Active Directory credentials. ONLYOFFICE™ does not save the user passwords locally and will authenticate users sending their login and password to LDAP server/Active Directory.

data.name: LdapSettingsDscr
data.value: The LDAP module allows you to import users and groups from the LDAP server, as well as provide user authentication on the portal using the login/password, stored in an LDAP server. Users will be imported immediately after saving the settings. New users added later will be imported during their first authentication on the portal. The information about the users edited at the LDAP server can be immediately updated using the 'Sync LDAP' button below. The LDAP module can be very flexibly configured to meet specific needs, but also requires some knowledge of LDAP.

data.name: NoteLDAPShouldKnow
data.value: The portal email user will be formed the following way: 'Login Attribute + @ + LDAP Domain'. In case such email does not exist, the user will not receive any portal notifications.

data.name: LdapSettingsWrongEmail
data.value: Wrong email {0} from LDAP user {1} {2}. Please replace it with correct email and try again.

data.name: LdapSettingsWrongSidAttribute
data.value: Unique ID for user/group objects could not be obtained. By default the system will try to match one of the following identifiers: entryUUID, nsuniqueid, GUID, objectSid. If none of the attributes corresponds to your LDAP server, please specify the necessary attribute in the ldap.unique.id setting of the web.appsettings.config file.

RestoreDesc

data.name: RestoreEmptyList

data.name: RestoreHelp
data.value: {0}Data Restore{1} option is used to restore your previously saved portal data (from a local server or SaaS portal). Select the storage where the data is saved, enter necessary details and check the {0}Send notification to portal users{1} to alert your portal users about the backup/restore operations.

data.name: RestorePortalProcessText
data.value: Once the restore process is over, you'll be automatically redirected to your portal.

data.name: RestoreSendNotification
data.value: Send notification about portal restoring to users

data.name: RestoreWarningText
data.value: The portal will become unavailable during the restore process. After the restore is complete all the changes made after the date of the selected restore point will be lost.

data.name: SearchNotFoundDescript
data.value: Make sure all words are spelled correctly. Try using different keywords.

data.name: SendInviteToJoinEmailDesc
data.value: Please enter the email address where the invitation will be sent:

data.name: ServerErrorText
data.value: The server software enconted an error while processing your request. Please wait for some time and try again. If the error persists, you might probably need to contact the site administrator.

data.name: SettingsAlreadyCurrentPortalVersion
data.value: This is the current version already

data.name: SignInFromAnyDomainInviteTitle
data.value: Registration is available to users with an email account at any domain. To register, enter your email and click on Send Invitation. An email message with a link to activate your ONLYOFFICE™ account will be sent to the specified email.

data.name: SmsAuthDescription
data.value: Two-factor authentication is available for paid portals only.{2} {0}Two-factor authentication{1} is a more secure way for the users to enter the portal. After the credentials are entered, the user will have to enter the code from the SMS received to the mobile phone with the number which was specified at the first portal login via the two-factor authentication.{2}Enable this option for a more secure portal access by all the portal users. {2}To apply the changes you made click the {0}Save{1} button below this section.{2} {0}Note{1}: when you are out of SMS the two-factor authentication portal access option will be automatically disabled. Do not forget to buy additional SMS package in good time.

data.name: SmsAuthenticationTimeout
data.value: Time to use the code has expired. Please request a new text message.

data.name: SmsNotPaidError
data.value: The number of SMS for the selected plan has been exceeded

data.name: SmsTooMuchError
data.value: You have sent too many text messages. Please try again later.

data.name: SMTPSettingsHelp
data.value: If you use a Gmail account for SMTP server, you will not be able to send mail until you do the following: sign in to the Gmail account you use via its standard web interface and confirm any verification questions about the ONLYOFFICE™ access attempt to the account, in case there are some.{0}We recommend using ports 587 or 25 for the email messages to be sent, as other values might prevent the SMTP from the correct work.

data.name: SmtpSettingsText
data.value: The SMTP settings are needed to set up an email account which will be used to send notifications from the portal using your own SMTP server instead of the one ONLYOFFICE™ uses. Please fill in all the fields and click the 'Save' button. You can use the 'Send Test Mail' button to check if all the settings you entered are correct and work as supposed.

data.value: Could not create the user with this authentication token

data.name: SsoSettingsEmptyToken
data.value: Authentication token could not be found

data.name: SsoSettingsHelp
SsoSettingsIssuerUrlHelper
data.value: Identifies the user account provider. Issuer URL is used to validate the SAML response or JWT token digital signatures.

data.name: SsoSettingsPublicKeyHelper
data.value: Depending on the validation type the key can be public X.509 certificate key, or public RSA SHA-256 key, or private HMAC SHA-256 key and is used for JWT token or SAML response signature validation.

data.name: SsoSettingsServiceProviderPublicKeyHelper
data.value: Client certificate public key is used to sign SAML requests. Some authentication providers, e.g. ADFS, accept signed SAML requests only.

data.name: SsoSettingsSloEndpointUrlHelper
data.value: When the user signs out of ONLYOFFICE portal he/she will be redirected to the entered URL.

data.name: SsoSettingsSsoEndpointUrlHelper
data.value: If SSO is initiated on service provider side the redirect will be made to the entered URL.

data.name: SsoSettingsSsoTypeHelper
data.value: Determines the type of the token which the account provider will transfer to the service provider during user authentication.

data.name: SsoSettingsValidationTypeHelper
data.value: When using JWT it is necessary to select the valid token signature validation type: using open X.509 certificate key, public asymmetric RSA SHA-256 algorithm key, or private symmetric HMAC SHA-256 algorithm key.

data.name: MailServiceHelp
data.value: This option allows to connect your portal to the {0}Mail Server{1} installed on a remote computer using the {2}Docker installation{3}.{4}{0}Note:{1} make sure that ports {0}3306{1} and {0}8081{1} are opened at the computer where {0}Mail Server{1} is installed. We also strongly recommend that you change your {0}Mail Server{1} database access password.

data.name: MailServiceCouldNotGetErrorMsg
data.value: Error: Сould not get hostname or auth token

data.name: MailServiceWarning
data.value: Warning: you already have Mail Domain settings and mailboxes for users present in your {0}Mail{1} module. Changing the settings here you realize that these changes can affect their work and result in mail server failure. If you completely moved the {0}Mail Server{1} to another computer and/or changed database access credentials, just update the {0}Mail Server IP{1} and/or credentials here. If you created a new {0}Mail Server{1} and want to connect it, you need to delete the old data at the {2}Mail Server page{3} first.

data.name: CookieSettingsHelp
